Description: Angular wheelmade Nile silt cup in a typical Meroitic style with flat base, low angular shoulder and straight walls with direct rim. Roughly made and lopsided. Covered in cream slip interior and exterior. Exterior decorated with two friezes delineated by two thin lines painted in red above, between, and below. Friezes filled with horizontal crescent shapes pointing to the mouth of the vessel, painted in red with a border of darker red. Incomplete.
